title: Vance reacts to Young Republicans leaked chat
shortDescription: In response to a Young Republicans leaked group chat, Vice President JD Vance said "kids do stupid things" while on "The Charlie Kirk Show."

title: Mamdani takes aim at Trump on Fox News
shortDescription: Zohran Mamdani, the leading candidate in New York City's mayoral race, appeared on Fox News for the first time and addressed President Trump.

title: Governor vs. Bernie-backed oysterman in fight to topple GOP senator
shortDescription: Maine Gov. Janet Mills announced her candidacy for U.S. Senate, setting up a race that may serve as a proxy for the direction of the Democratic party.

title: Day 16 of government shutdown, another Senate vote: Live updates
shortDescription: The Democrats and Republicans are still deadlocked as the Senate failed to muster enough votes for a ninth time on the House-passed Republican bill

title: Brown University rejects Trump's higher education 'compact'
shortDescription: Brown University President Christina Paxson said that the compact would "restrict academic freedom."

title: Arc de Trump? Trump offers a new project for nation's capital
shortDescription: Trump, whose background is in real estate, has made several changes in the White House, including a Rose Garden makeover and gilding the Oval Office.

title: Trump eyes land strikes on cartels
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says land strikes on drug cartels are possible after multiple deadly boat strikes in the Caribbean.

title: Capitol Police probes swastika spotted in Rep. Dave Taylor's office
shortDescription: The U.S. Capitol Police opened an investigation after a swastika was spotted inside Republican Rep Dave Taylor's office on Oct. 14.

title: US is in a trade war with China, Trump says
shortDescription: Chinaâ€™s decision to restrict export of rare earth minerals on Oct. 10 triggered a round two of tit-for-tat actions.

title: Trump eyes San Francisco crackdown
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said San Francisco may be next in his federal anti-crime crackdown despite local opposition.

title: Trump says he may attend Supreme Court arguments
shortDescription: President Trump said he might attend the Supreme Court argument on tariffs because he argued the case is so important to the country's financial security.

title: Trump says San Francisco could be next target for anti-crime push
shortDescription: Trump has deployed the National Guard in Los Angeles; Washington; Chicago; Portland, Oregon, and Memphis, Tennessee, for crime fighting missions.

title: Trump might attend Supreme Court tariff arguments
shortDescription: Trump said he might attend the Supreme Court argument on tariffs because he argued the case is so important to the country's financial security.

title: Trump 'looking at' strikes on land against Venezuelan cartels
shortDescription: Trump said he is considering military strikes on land targets in his campaign to halt the flow of drugs from Venezuela after five recent boat attacks.

title: Judge temporarily reverses Trump's special ed layoffs
shortDescription: The firings were part of a broad swath of shutdown-related terminations issued by the White House on Friday, Oct. 10.

title: 'Hatchet is falling': Judge temporarily blocks Trump shutdown layoffs
shortDescription: A federal judge temporarily halted thousands of layoffs the Trump administration ordered in response to the government shutdown.
